# Exploring Gameplay

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-gameplay-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:07:47.077869

---

Explore examples that show how you can combine devices to make different components and interactions in a game or experience.

There are lots of ways you can use these examples on your island to create fresh, new [game mechanics](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#game-mechanics). Use these combinations on your island to create a full island experience your friends and supporters will remember!

[![5 Rounds of Econ Lessons](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/e2d0a337-19d2-4b67-92aa-1f13cef387a7?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

5 Rounds of Econ Lessons

5 Rounds of Econ Lessons will teach you how to create a simple, round-based economy in Fortnite Creative.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/5-rounds-of-econ-lessons-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Accolades Device Gameplay Examples](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/b3bd171e-b214-4793-8bbb-e409e09db9ce?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Accolades Device Gameplay Examples

Use the Accolades device to reward players with Battlepass XP.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/accolades-device-gameplay-examples-in-fortnite-creative)[![Boulder Trap](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/3bd212e6-3968-4447-b0f6-f0b2fba7ce3c?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Boulder Trap

Challenge players to avoid being crushed by combining a few devices.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/boulder-trap-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Class Setup In an Arena](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4cac8fa0-465f-4061-a9a4-b80269934314?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Class Setup In an Arena

Use Class Designers and Selectors to create a fun course that changes a player's class.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/class-setup-in-an-arena-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Color Switch Challenge](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/67258e1f-e5aa-4f0d-a8d1-5cdf2c4cd4a6?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Color Switch Challenge

Use Trick Tiles and other devices to create a challenging trap for players.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/color-switch-challenge-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Domination Game Tutorial](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5bb3f1b6-f7bf-4e85-b862-3e6643758c8d?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Domination Game Tutorial

Create zones that teams can capture for game points using Capture Area devices.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/domination-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Dungeon Crawler Example](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4fb5d247-2083-431e-9864-f750140f0b9f?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Dungeon Crawler Example

Use Capture Areas to create zones that teams must capture and hold to gain points.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/dungeon-crawler-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![End of Round Team Swapping](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ba23245f-186d-48e2-8206-3c06c2ab0946?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

End of Round Team Swapping

Swap a player's team at the end of each round to create extra challenge!](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/end-of-round-team-swapping-in-fortnite-creative)[![Escape Room Key Mechanics](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4b033dfc-2f53-40c7-8fc2-3f17dc241b5a?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Escape Room Key Mechanics

Learn to create a basic escape room mechanic using a key that you can easily modify and replicate.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/escape-room-key-gameplay-examples-in-fortnite-creative)[![Knock Knock](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/678506c7-e5e1-4338-bec0-7fe579d9fe69?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Lava Bounce

Use pinball bumper devices to navigate across a pool of lava to the objective.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/lava-bounce-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Loadout Lobby](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/526d2f38-5586-4d6f-b6b4-d2a33a3ca47b?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Loadout Lobby

Loadout Lobby is a pre-game waiting room, where players gather to load up on weapons before being spawned on the island.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/loadout-lobby-gameplay-example-in-fortnite-creative)[![Loo Roll Rush](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/be2372d3-2dcd-4f38-8a11-5b113d7cdb9e?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Loo Roll Rush

Use various devices to create a path of items players must pick up as fast as they can.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/loo-roll-rush-in-fortnite-creative)[![Mazey Escape](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8e57d77e-448b-45da-9a9c-e64c4cdf4a46?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Random Sentry Fight

Search and Destroy Bomb
